entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Sudbury (Greater)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:12 p.m. EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 7.5Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Sudbury Airport 5:00 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 7.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 5 km
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 6.9°C
Wind: SE 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3
